roleset.name: cause to) be on fire

example.name: Arg 0 only
example.text: This ointment will relieve the burn and itch of poison ivy.

example.name: ArgMs only
example.text: The smoke from the annual burn on the slopes outside the villages hung in the air.
example.arg: on the slopes outside the villages

example.name: Arg 1 & TMP
example.text: The burn of calories during a marathon is quite high.

example.name: All Arguments
example.text: They are seeking to increase their burn of low-sulphur imported coal.

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb entry burn.01, OntoNotes grouping burn-n senses 2, 4, & 6; maps to VN classes entity_specific_cos-45.5, entity_specific_modes_being-47.2, light_emission-43.1, other_cos-45.4. Framed by Claire.

example.name: NOT EVENTIVE, call .YY.
example.text: But Mr. Warren says the woman has `` psychic burns '' on her back from the confrontation .
example.note: The rel below refers to the damaged tissue resulting from the event of burning, and is not in itself an event.
